flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: How to make a Union Jack Shelf.
guide.introduction_rendered:
How to make a Union Jack Shelf.

Tools
  • paint brushes for priming & painting

lines.text: This is the end result. Keep reading for the tutorial.
lines.text_raw: This is the end result. Keep reading for the tutorial.

lines.text: You will need: Interior paint (pink, orange and white), paint brush, tape
lines.text_raw: You will need: Interior paint (pink, orange and white), paint brush, tape

lines.text: Start taping the shelf. Tape the front in a Union Jack shape and continue the design onto the top.
lines.text_raw: Start taping the shelf. Tape the front in a Union Jack shape and continue the design onto the top.

lines.text: Start painting the pink stripes. Let dry and attach the tape in 1cm distance from the pink, so that you can then paint the orange color.
lines.text_raw: Start painting the pink stripes. Let dry and attach the tape in 1cm distance from the pink, so that you can then paint the orange color.

lines.text: You can correct little errors with the white paint.
lines.text_raw: You can correct little errors with the white paint.

lines.text: Dont forget to paint the sides as well.
lines.text_raw: Dont forget to paint the sides as well.

guide.summary: Pimp up a white TV shelf with just a little bit of color and tape.
guide.title: Union Jack Shelf
